message.reason: '%1' is not a recognized transformation type.
message.response: Supported transformation types are .

message.reason: Input not specified, or specified using the wrong parameter.
Cannot find the user-specified XSLT stylesheet '%1'.
Invalid file name extension '%1'.
message.response: The '.dita' and '.xml' file name extensions are supported for DITA topics.

message.reason: The '%1' argument is deprecated.
message.response: This argument is no longer supported.

message.reason: The '%1' argument is deprecated.
message.response: Use the '%2' argument instead.

message.reason: Cannot find the specified DITAVAL file '%1'.
The @%1 attribute is deprecated.
message.response: Use the @%2 attribute instead.

message.reason: The internal property '%1' may not be set directly.
message.response: Use the '%2' property instead.

message.reason: The input resource '%1' cannot be located or read.
message.response: Make sure '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Failed to create new instance for '%1'.
message.response: Make sure '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: Using the first condition found.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: Using the first condition found.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: Using the first condition found.

message.reason: Cannot overwrite the '%1' resource with '%2'. The modified result may not be available to the following transformation steps.
message.response: Check if the resource is locked by some other application during the transformation process.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1'.
Failed to parse the referenced resource '%1'.
Found an <indexterm> element with no content.
message.response: Setting the term to '***'.

message.reason: The '%1' log file was written to the '%2' directory.
message.response: Any messages from the transformation process are available in the log; additional details about each message may be available in the documentation.

message.reason: The '%2' plug-in cannot be loaded because it requires at least one plug-in in '%1'.
message.response: Make sure all prerequisite plug-ins are properly installed.

message.reason: No output generated for '%1' because all content has been filtered out by DITAVAL 'exclude' conditions, or the resource is not valid DITA.
message.response: Check the '%1' resource and the DITAVAL file to see if this is the intended result.

message.reason: No output generated for '%1' because all content has been filtered out by DITAVAL 'exclude' conditions, or the resource is not valid DITA.
message.response: Check the '%1' resource and the DITAVAL file to see if this is the intended result.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1' because all of its content has been filtered out.
message.response: This can happen if the resource has filter conditions on the root element, and a DITAVAL file excludes all content based on those conditions.

message.reason: The specified image file '%1' is not available. It is not included in the output.
message.response: Make sure '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: The input to the 'topic merge' process cannot be found.
message.response: Correct any earlier errors and try the build again, or see the documentation for additional details.

message.reason: The 'topic merge' process did not generate any output.
message.response: Correct any earlier errors and try the build again, or see the documentation for additional details.

message.reason: No @format attribute was found on a reference to the '%1' resource, which does not appear to be DITA.
message.response: If this is not a DITA resource, set the @format attribute to an appropriate value; otherwise set the @format attribute to 'dita'.

message.reason: No @domains attribute was found for the <%1> element.
message.response: This generally indicates that the grammar files (such as DTDs or schemas) were not developed properly according to the DITA specification.

message.reason: No @class attribute was found for the <%1> element.
message.response: Processing as an unknown or non-DITA element.

message.reason: No rule for '%1' was found in the DITAVAL file. Using the default action, or a parent prop action if specified.
message.response: To remove this message, specify a rule for '%1' in the DITAVAL file.

message.reason: No valid content found in the referenced resource '%1' during chunk processing.
message.response: Specify an existing and valid topic for the topic reference.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1' (the content is not valid).
message.response: If '%1' does not have a DOCTYPE declaration, make sure that all @class attributes are present.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is outside the scope of the input directory.
message.response: To lower the severity level, use the Ant parameter 'outer.control', and set the value to 'warn' or 'quiet'. Otherwise, move the '%1' resource to the directory where the input map or topic is stored.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is outside the scope of the input directory.
The XML schema and DTD validation function of the parser is turned off.
message.response: For correct processing, make sure the input is normalized DITA with @class attributes included.

message.reason: The <%1> element is specialized from unrecognized metadata.
message.response: Make sure that the <%1> element is specialized from an existing metadata element in the core DITA vocabulary.

message.reason: There is no target specified for the conref push action 'pushafter'.
message.response: Specify a @conref target and set the 'mark' @conaction on the element that precedes the current element.

message.reason: An element uses the conref push action 'pushreplace', but no @conref attribute is defined.
message.response: Specify a @conref target with the ID of the content you want to replace.

message.reason: The @conref attribute value '%1' uses invalid syntax.
message.response: The value must contain '#' followed by a topic or map ID, optionally followed by '/elemID' for a sub-topic element.

message.reason: Two elements both use conref push to replace the target '%1'.
message.response: Delete one of the duplicate 'pushreplace' actions.

message.reason: The conref push function is trying to replace an element <%1> that does not exist in the '%2' resource.
message.response: Update the reference to refer to a valid target.

message.reason: There is a redundant conref push action 'pushbefore'.
message.response: Make sure that 'mark' and 'pushbefore' occur in pairs.

message.reason: The key '%1' is defined more than once in the same map.
The @conkeyref attribute value '%1' cannot be resolved because it does not contain a key or the key is not defined.
message.response: Using the @conref attribute as fallback if it exists.

message.reason: Unable to find key definition for key reference '%1' in root scope.
message.response: Using the @href attribute as fallback if it exists.

message.reason: Unable to find key definition for key reference '%1' in scope '%2'.
message.response: Using the @href attribute as fallback if it exists.

message.reason: The @%1 attribute value '%3' on the <%2> element does not comply with the specified subject scheme.
message.response: According to the subject scheme map, the following values are valid for the @%1 attribute: '%4'.

message.reason: Found an <index-see> or <index-see-also> reference to the term '%1', but that term is not defined in the index.
Unable to load target for coderef '%1'.
message.response: Make sure '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Unsupported code reference charset '%1'.
message.response: See the documentation for supported character set values on the @format attribute.

message.reason: The input resource '%1' is not a valid DITA filename.
message.response: Check '%1' to see if it is correct. The '.dita' and '.xml' file name extensions are supported for DITA topics.

message.reason: Unable to parse invalid @%1 attribute value '%2'.
Invalid key name '%1'.
message.response: Key names consist of URI characters and may not contain '{', '}', '[', ']', '/', '#', '?' or whitespace.

message.reason: Invalid @xml:lang attribute value '%1'.
message.response: Check the correct value for the target language.

message.reason: The @id attribute value '%1' is not unique within the topic that contains it.
Both the @%1 and @%2 attributes are defined.
message.response: A single element may not contain both generalized and specialized values for the same attribute.

message.reason: Invalid key scope name '%1'.
The '%1' key is used in a @conkeyref attribute but it is not bound to a DITA topic or map.
message.response: Cannot resolve '%2' as a valid content key reference.

message.reason: Topic reference target is a DITA map but the @format attribute has not been set.
message.response: Set the @format attribute value to 'ditamap'.

message.reason: Invalid @%1 attribute value '%2'.
The @cols attribute is set to '%1' but the number of <colspec> elements was '%2'.
message.response: Check the number of columns in the table.

message.reason: The @chunk attribute uses both 'to-content' and 'by-topic' that conflict with each other.
message.response: Ignoring the 'by-topic' token.

message.reason: Branch filter generated topic '%1' is used more than once.
message.response: Renaming '%1' to '%2'.

message.reason: No @id attribute on topic type element '%1'.
message.response: Using generated ID '%2'.

message.response: Using @scope attribute value 'external'.

message.response: Using @scope attribute value 'external'.

Invalid @action attribute '%1' on DITAVAL property.
The input resource '%1' cannot be loaded.
message.response: Make sure the grammar files (such as DTDs or schemas) for this document type are properly referenced and installed.

message.response: Make sure the grammar files (such as DTDs or schemas) for this document type are properly referenced and installed.

Processing table cell failed.
The resource referenced as '%1' is capitalized differently on disk.
Cannot read '%1' with the '%2' character set.
message.response: Save the file with '%2' encoding.

message.response: Use '%2' instead.

message.reason: XML parsing error: %1
No string named '%1' was found for language '%2'. Using the default language '%3'.

message.reason: The @title attribute or element in the DITA map is required for Eclipse output.
The @anchorref attribute should either reference another DITA map or an Eclipse XML TOC file.

message.response: The <navref> element should either reference another DITA map or an Eclipse XML TOC file.

message.reason: Unable to find navigation title for reference to '%1'.
message.response: Using '%1' as the title in the Eclipse Table of Contents.

message.reason: Unknown file name extension in @href attribute value '%1'.
message.response: References to non-DITA resources should set the @format attribute to match the resource (for example, 'txt', 'pdf', or 'html').

message.reason: Only DITA topics, HTML files, and images may be included in the compiled CHM file. Ignoring reference to '%1'.
message.response: To remove this message, set the @toc attribute to 'no' or the @processing-role attribute to 'resource-only' on the topic reference.

message.reason: The resource '%1' cannot be loaded.
message.response: Make sure '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: The resource '%1' cannot be loaded, and no navigation title is specified for the table of contents.
Cannot retrieve a title from '%1'. Using '%2' instead.
Unable to find the @conref target '%1'.
message.response: Check '%1' to see if the target resource exists.

message.reason: There is more than one possible target for the @conref attribute value '%1'. Using the first value found.
message.response: Remove the duplicate ID in the referenced resource.

message.reason: When you conref another topic or an item in another topic, the @domains attribute of the target topic must be equal to or a subset of the current topic's @domains attribute.
message.response: Put the target under an appropriate domain.

message.reason: An element with the @conref attribute set to '%1' indirectly includes itself, which results in an infinite loop.
The @conref attribute value '%1' uses invalid syntax.
message.response: Content references to a map element should contain '#' followed by an ID, such as 'mymap.ditamap#mytopicrefid'.

message.reason: The @conref attribute value '%1' uses invalid syntax.
message.response: The value must contain '#' followed by a topic or map ID, optionally followed by '/elemID' for a sub-topic element.

message.reason: '%2' appears to reference a DITA document, but the @format attribute has inherited a value of '%1'.
message.response: Processing as a non-DITA resource. To process as DITA, set the @format attribute to 'dita'.

message.reason: Found a link or cross reference with an empty @href attribute.
message.response: Remove the empty @href attribute or provide a value.

message.reason: The @type attribute on a topicref was set to '%1', but the topicref references a more specific '%2' topic.
message.response: Note that the @type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%1' may come from an ancestor topicref.

message.reason: The @type attribute on a topicref was set to '%1', but the topicref references a '%2' topic.
message.response: This may cause links to sort incorrectly in the output. Note that the @type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%1' may come from an ancestor topicref.

message.reason: Missing @navtitle attribute or element for peer topic '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Missing @navtitle attribute or element for non-DITA resource '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Unable to retrieve navtitle from target: '%1'.
message.response: Using topicmeta linktext as the navigation title.

Missing linktext and navtitle for peer topic '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Missing linktext and navtitle for non-DITA resource '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is not available to resolve link information.

Unable to generate the correct number for a cross reference to a footnote: '%1'.

No title found for this document; using '***' as HTML page title.
Ignoring the @longdescref attribute on the <%1> element.
message.response: Accessibility for object elements needs to be handled another way.

message.reason: Required cleanup area found.
message.response: To remove this message and hide the content, build without the DRAFT parameter.

message.reason: Draft comment area found.
message.response: To remove this message and hide the comments, build without the DRAFT parameter.

message.reason: Found more than one <title> element in a <%1> element. Using the first one as the element title.
DITAVAL-based flagging is not currently supported for inline phrases in XHTML; ignoring flag value on '%1' attribute.
The link to '%1' may appear more than once in '%2'.
The <area> element in an image map does not specify a link target.
message.response: Add an <xref> element with a link target to the <area> element.

message.reason: The <area> element in an image map should specify link text for better accessibility.
message.response: Link text should be specified directly when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Area shape should be one of: default, rect, circle, poly, or blank (no value). The value '%1' is not recognized.
Area coordinates are blank. Coordinate points for the shape need to be specified.
References to non-DITA files are ignored by the PDF, ODT, and RTF transformations.
The default ID 'org.sample.help.doc' is used for the Eclipse plug-in.
message.response: To use your own plug-in ID, specify it using the @id attribute on the map.

message.reason: No string named '%1' was found when creating generated text; using the value '%1' in the output.
A element that references another map indirectly includes itself, which results in an infinite loop.
message.response: The original map reference is to '%1'.

message.reason: Conflict text style is applied on the current element based on DITAVAL flagging rules.
message.response: Check the DITAVAL and DITA source files to make sure there is no style conflict on the element that needs to be flagged.

message.reason: A customized stylesheet uses the deprecated 'flagit' template. Conditional processing is no longer supported using this template.
message.response: Update the stylesheet to use the 'start-flagit' template instead of the 'flagit' template.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is not available to resolve link information.
The link or cross reference target '%1' cannot be found, which may cause errors in the output.
No glossary entry found for the '%1' key on the <%2> element.
message.response: Check display text and hover text for terms and abbreviations.

message.reason: The '%1' key is used in an <abbreviated-form> element, but the key is not associated with a glossary entry.
message.response: Abbreviated-form should ONLY be used to reference a glossary entry.

message.reason: The @href attribute value '%1' contains a fragment identifier, but it does not reference a topic element.
message.response: The @href attribute on a <topicref> element should only reference topic-level elements.

message.reason: It appears that this document uses constraints, but the conref processor cannot validate that the target of a conref is valid.
message.response: To enable constraint checking, upgrade to an XSLT 2.0 processor.

message.reason: The DITA document '%1' is linked to from the content, but not referenced by a <topicref> element in the map.
message.response: Include the topic in the map to avoid a broken link.

message.reason: The @copy-to attribute value '%1' uses the name of a resource that already exists, so this attribute is ignored.
Two unique source files each specify a @copy-to attribute value '%2', which results in a collision.
message.response: Ignoring the @copy-to value associated with the @href value '%1'.

message.reason: The '%1' template is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this template from the custom XSLT or plug-ins.

message.reason: A <topicref> element that references a map contains child <topicref> elements.

message.reason: The '%1' template mode is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this template mode from custom XSLT or plug-ins.

message.reason: The '%1' target is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this target from custom Ant files.

Removing broken link to '%1'.

A content reference in a constrained document type is pulling content from an unconstrained document type.
message.response: Resolving this reference may result in content that violates one of the document constraints in '%1'.
